maqras.text: Blessed is the One who sent down the criterion to His servant, to be a warning for humankind
the One that rule of the skies and the earth belongs to Him and He did not take a child and there is no partner for Him in the rule and He created everything and determined it proportionately
And they took gods other than Him that do not create anything and they are created, and they have no power to harm or benefit themselves, and they have no power over death and life and resurrection
And those who disbelieved said: this (Quran) is only a lie that he made up and other people have helped him with it. So they have certainly committed wrongdoing and lie
And they said: (these are) stories of the earlier ones that he copied it and it is dictated to him morning and afternoon
Say: the One who knows the secret of the skies and the earth sent it down. Indeed He is forgiving and merciful
And they said: what is with this messenger that he eats the food and he walks in the markets (and streets), why was not an angel sent down to him to be a warner with him
Or a treasure is not given to him, or there is no garden for him to eat from it? And the wrongdoers said: you are only following a bewitched man
See how they gave examples about you, they are lost and they cannot find a way
Blessed is the One who gives you better than that if He wants, gardens which rivers flow through them and He gives you palaces
No, but they denied the hour and We prepared a burning fire for anyone who denies the hour
When it sees them from a far place, they hear it raging and roaring
And when they are thrown into a tight place of it, chained together, there they call for death
Today do not call for death once, but call for death many times
Say: is this better or the eternal garden that was promised to those who control themselves? It (garden) is a reward and a destination for them
They have whatever they want in there, remaining forever. This is a promise that is your Masterâ€™s responsibility
And a day He gathers them and whatever they served other than God, then He says: did you misguide these My servants or did they lose the way

They say: You are flawless, it is not appropriate for us to take any protector other than You, but You gave them and their fathers joy (and comfort) until they forgot the reminder and they became doomed people
So they have denied you in what you say, therefore you cannot turn away (the punishment) or get any help (yourselves). And whoever does wrong among you, We make him taste a great punishment
And We did not send any of the messengers before you unless they ate food and walked in the market, and We made some of you a test for the others, would you persevere? And your Master sees all
